Package algorithms

Class SmallBranchingSearch

java.lang.Object
algorithms.SmallBranchingSearch
public class SmallBranchingSearch extends Object
Implements a reduced branching search algorithm to solve the Pentomino puzzle.

This strategy is optimized to reduce the number of possibilities it explores by checking for potential issues ahead of time, before placing a piece.

  • Method Details

    • basicSearch

      public boolean basicSearch(int[][] field, int index, char[] sortedPieces)
      Attempts to solve the puzzle using a recursive reduced branching approach.
      Parameters:
      field - The 2D grid representing the current state of the board.
      index - The index of the current Pentomino piece being placed.
      sortedPieces - The ordered list of pieces to be placed.
      Returns:
      true if a solution is found, false otherwise.

    • canPlace

      public boolean canPlace(int[][] piece, int col, int row, int[][] field, int width, int height)
      Checks if a pentomino piece can be placed on the field.
      Parameters:
      piece - The pentomino piece.
      col - The column to start placing the piece from.
      row - The row to start placing the piece from.
      field - The 2D grid representing the current state of the board.
      width - The width of the field.
      height - The height of the field.
      Returns:
      true if the piece can be placed, false otherwise.

    • addPiece

      public void addPiece(int[][] field, int[][] piece, int pieceID, int col, int row)
      Adds a pentomino piece to the field.
      Parameters:
      field - The 2D grid representing the current state of the board.
      piece - The pentomino piece to be placed.
      pieceID - The ID of the pentomino piece.
      col - The column where the top-left cell of the piece will be placed.
      row - The row where the top-left cell of the piece will be placed.

    • removePiece

      public void removePiece(int[][] field, int[][] piece, int col, int row)
      Removes a pentomino piece from the board.
      Parameters:
      field - Current state of the board.
      piece - Pentomino piece to be removed.
      col - Column where the top-left cell of the piece was placed.
      row - Row where the top-left cell of the piece was placed.
